electronics_shop.switch ki price: Switch ka price type ke hisab se alag hai. Basic switch 15-25 rupees, modular switch 40-80 rupees, fancy switch 100-200 rupees mein milta hai.
electronics_shop.fan ki price: Ceiling fan ki price 2000 se 5000 rupees tak hai. Basic fan 2000-3000, branded fan 3500-5000 rupees mein milta hai.
electronics_shop.wire ka rate: Wire ka rate size ke hisab se hai. 1.5mm wire 35-40 rupees per meter, 2.5mm wire 55-60 rupees per meter, 4mm wire 85-90 rupees per meter.
electronics_shop.led bulb price: LED bulb ka price wattage ke hisab se hai. 9W LED 80-120 rupees, 12W LED 100-150 rupees, 15W LED 120-180 rupees mein milta hai.
electronics_shop.socket ki price: Socket ka price 25-50 rupees hai. Basic socket 25-35 rupees, modular socket 40-50 rupees mein milta hai.
electronics_shop.mcb price: MCB ka price amperage ke hisab se hai. 16A MCB 150-200 rupees, 25A MCB 180-250 rupees, 32A MCB 200-280 rupees.
electronics_shop.cable price: Cable ka price per meter hai. 2 core cable 45-55 rupees, 3 core cable 65-75 rupees per meter.
electronics_shop.tube light price: LED tube light ka price 300-800 rupees hai length ke hisab se. 2 feet tube 300-500, 4 feet tube 500-800 rupees.
electronics_shop.inverter price: Inverter ka price capacity ke hisab se hai. 800VA inverter 5000-8000, 1000VA inverter 7000-10000 rupees.
electronics_shop.battery price: Inverter battery ka price 150AH battery 8000-12000 rupees, 200AH battery 12000-16000 rupees.

general_business.business hours: Humara shop subah 9 baje se raat 8 baje tak khula rehta hai. Sunday ko 10 baje se 6 baje tak.
general_business.warranty policy: Electrical items pe 1 saal warranty hai. Fan aur inverter pe 2 saal warranty milti hai.
general_business.installation service: Installation service available hai. Basic fitting 200-500 rupees, heavy work 500-1500 rupees charging hai.
general_business.delivery service: Delivery service available hai. Local area mein free delivery, bahar ka 50-100 rupees delivery charge.
general_business.payment methods: Cash, UPI, card sab accept karte hain. EMI bhi available hai 5000 rupees se upar ke items pe.
general_business.bulk discount: Bulk order pe discount milta hai. 10000 rupees se upar 5% discount, 25000 se upar 10% discount.
general_business.return policy: 7 din mein return kar sakte hain original bill ke saath. Item condition achhi honi chahiye.

technical_support.wiring problem: Wiring problem ke liye electrician call kar sakte hain. Basic checking 300-500 rupees, repair alag se charge.
technical_support.short circuit: Short circuit ke liye turant main switch off karein. Electrician ko call karein, khud se touch mat karein.
technical_support.power fluctuation: Power fluctuation ke liye stabilizer use karein. Ghar ke liye 5KVA stabilizer sufficient hai.
technical_support.earth connection: Earth connection jaruri hai safety ke liye. Proper earthing 2000-3000 rupees mein ho jaati hai.
technical_support.phase problem: 3 phase problem ke liye phase sequence meter use karte hain. Checking aur repair 800-1500 rupees.

product_recommendations.home wiring: Ghar ke liye copper wire best hai. 1.5mm lights ke liye, 2.5mm plugs ke liye, 4mm AC ke liye use karein.
product_recommendations.fan selection: Room size ke hisab se fan select karein. 12x12 room ke liye 1200mm fan, 10x10 ke liye 1050mm fan sufficient.
product_recommendations.led vs cfl: LED bulb CFL se better hai. Kam bijli khata hai aur jyada chalti hai. Investment thoda jyada but fayda jyada.
product_recommendations.stabilizer size: Ghar ke total load ke hisab se stabilizer lein. AC, fridge, TV sab ka load add karke 20% extra capacity lein.
product_recommendations.inverter battery: Inverter ke saath tubular battery best hai. Maintenance kam aur backup jyada milta hai.
